languages.text:
Начертанные Блаженными иконы украсили палубы корабля.
~// Шанс критического попадания и варп-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} по {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагману{/g} снижены на 30%

traits.locale_text:
Начертанные Блаженными иконы украсили палубы корабля.
~// Шанс критического попадания и варп-урон по флагману снижены на -30%

languages.text:
Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} are reduced by −30%
languages.original_text:
Начертанные Блаженными иконы украсили палубы корабля.
~// Шанс критического попадания и варп-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} по {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагману{/g} снижены на 30%

traits.locale_text: Sacred images painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
Sacred images painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.

Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp damage against the flagship are reduced by -30%

Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} are reduced by −30%

languages.text:
Des icônes sacrées peintes par les Illuminés décorent les ponts du vaisseau.
~// Les chances d’infliger un coup critique de l'ennemi et les {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} warp infligés au {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} sont réduits de 30 %.
languages.original_text:
Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} are reduced by −30%

traits.locale_text: Des icônes sacrées peintes par les Illuminés décorent les ponts du vaisseau.

languages.text:
触れられし者が描いた、船の甲板に飾られている聖なるアイコン。
~//旗艦に対する敵のクリティカルヒット率とワープダメージが−30%減少する
languages.original_text:
Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp damage against the flagship are reduced by -30%

traits.locale_text: 触れられし者が描いた、船の甲板に飾られている聖なるアイコン。

languages.text:
受召者在飞船甲板上绘下的神圣标志。
~// 敌人对{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的暴击率降低30%，对旗舰造成的亚空间{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低30%。
languages.original_text:
Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} are reduced by −30%

traits.locale_text:
受召者在飞船甲板上绘下的神圣标志。
~// 敌人对{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的暴击率降低30%，对旗舰造成的亚空间{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低30%。

受召者在飞船甲板上绘下了神圣的印记。
~// 敌人对旗舰的暴击率降低30%，旗舰受到的亚空间伤害降低30%。

languages.text:
Iconos sagrados pintados por los Tocados adornan las cubiertas de la nave.
~//La probabilidad de impacto crítico del enemigo y el {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de disformidad contra la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se reducen en −30 %.
languages.original_text:
Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} are reduced by −30%

traits.locale_text:
Iconos sagrados pintados por los Tocados adornan las cubiertas de la nave.
~//La probabilidad de impacto crítico del enemigo y el {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de disformidad contra la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se reducen en −30 %.

Iconos sagrados pintados por los Tocados adornan las cubiertas de la nave.
~//La probabilidad de impacto crítico del enemigo y el daño de disformidad contra la nave insignia se reducen en −30 %.

languages.text:
Heilige Ikonen, die von den Berührten gemalt wurden, schmücken die Decks des Schiffs.
~// Gegnerische kritische Trefferchance und Warp-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gegen das Flaggschiff werden um 30 % reduziert
languages.original_text:
Sacred icons painted by the Touched adorn the ship's decks.
~// Enemy critical hit chances and warp damage against the flagship are reduced by -30%

traits.locale_text: Heilige Ikonen, die von den Berührten gemalt wurden, schmücken die Decks des Schiffs.
